snippet: Serena Williams had been out of the tournament for less than 20 minutes when she climbed into her white Mini Cooper with the checkerboard top and pulled away from the players' parking lot, fastening her seat belt as she drove....
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams had been out of the tournament for less than 20 minutes when she climbed into her white Mini Cooper with the checkerboard top and pulled away from the players' parking lot, fastening her seat belt as she drove.

headline.print_headline: Serena Williams Upset by Kuznetsova in 3 Sets at Miami Open
headline.main: Serena Williams Upset by Kuznetsova in 3 Sets at Miami Open
